subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: David Toms shot his second straight eight-under-par 62 at the Colonial in Fort Worth, matching the PGA Tour record for the first 36 holes to open a seven-stroke lead.
snippet: David Toms shot his second straight eight-under-par 62 at the Colonial in Fort Worth, matching the PGA Tour record for the first 36 holes to open a seven-stroke lead.
